info.title: SysDVR Overlay
info.author: Hartie95
info.description: Overlay to check and change the current mode of SysDVR.
info.details:
This is a simple Tesla overlay to check and change the current mode of SysDVR.

Setup

Setup the tesla menu and nx-ovlloader
Setup SysDVR

changelog: 1.0.13\nThis update just adds compatibility with the newest SysDVR version 6.2.1\nI will look into adding support for starting/stopping the sysdvr module at a later point.
